item.title: Hello world!
item.description: Hello world! (Original, innit?) This is my blog where I will be posting ideas and projects I am working on, wanting to give something back to the communities I am active in, from software to electronics and 3D printing. Thanks for checking out my little place on the internet, and I hope you’ll enjoy the content! - Calin
